hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.ff.domain.serviceOffering.PaymentModeDO paymentMode WHERE paymentMode.paymentId IN (SELECT processMap.paymentModeDO.paymentId FROM com.ff.domain.serviceOffering.PaymentModeProcessMapDO processMap WHERE processMap.processDO.processId IN (SELECT process.processId FROM com.ff.domain.tracking.ProcessDO process WHERE process.processCode=:processCode) AND processMap.status=:status) AND paymentMode.status=:status

FROM com.ff.domain.serviceOffering.PaymentModeDO paymentMode WHERE paymentMode.paymentCode=:payModeCode and paymentMode.paymentId IN (SELECT processMap.paymentModeDO.paymentId FROM com.ff.domain.serviceOffering.PaymentModeProcessMapDO processMap WHERE processMap.processDO.processId IN (SELECT process.processId FROM com.ff.domain.tracking.ProcessDO process WHERE process.processCode=:processCode) AND processMap.status=:status) AND paymentMode.status=:status
